cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Bacardi
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Rose
cocktails.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.preparation: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.preparation: Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.preparation: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

cocktails.name: Planter's Punch
cocktails.preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.

cocktails.name: Sea Breeze
cocktails.preparation: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Angel Face
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.preparation: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.garnish: Half an orange slice and cherry
cocktails.preparation: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.preparation: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Porto Flip
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini

ingredients.special: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Yellow Bird
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Aviation
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.preparation: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.preparation: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Rusty Nail
cocktails.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: B52
cocktails.preparation: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Golden Dream
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: God Mother
cocktails.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Spritz Veneziano
cocktails.preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.preparation: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

cocktails.name: French Martini
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.preparation: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.

cocktails.name: Mai-tai
cocktails.garnish: Pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime wedge
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Monkey Gland
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Derby
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.preparation: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.preparation: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.preparation: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.

cocktails.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Dirty Martini
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Special
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktails.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.

cocktails.name: Ramos Fizz
cocktails.preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

cocktails.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktails.preparation: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.

cocktails.name: God Father
cocktails.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha

ingredients.special: Whole lime - 1 hal and cut into 4 wedges

cocktails.preparation: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

cocktails.name: Vampiro

ingredients.special: Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers

cocktails.garnish: Lime wedge and a green or red chili
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.

cocktails.name: Kamikaze
cocktails.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktails.preparation: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.

cocktails.name: Classic Daiquiri
cocktails.preparation: Make it

cocktails.name: Bourbon
cocktails.preparation: Make it

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.preparation: Make it

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.preparation: Make it
